name: api-updator
description: Generate NestJS CRUD resources using Prisma contracts and wire controllers/services to Prisma with Swagger annotations.

options.description: Target Nest app directory under apps/.
Prisma model name (PascalCase). Use comma-separated values for multiple models.
Generate resources for all models discovered in Prisma schema files under packages/database/prisma.
Override the resource path/name (defaults to pluralized kebab-case model name).
Overwrite existing files unless a no-auto-update directive is present.
